common.title: Ant Card
common.subtitle: AI Driven Resume Editor
common.description: Ant Card is an open source resume editor, free, privacy-first. No registration required, all data stored locally, support data backup and export, ensuring your resume data is always available.

hero.title: Make Resume Creation Simple and Smart
hero.subtitle: Ant Card uses AI technology to help you quickly create professional resumes. No registration required, free to use, with secure data storage.

features.title: Why Choose Ant Card?
features.subtitle: We provide an all-in-one resume solution to make your job search journey smoother

ai.title: Smart Detection, Professional Advice
ai.description: Built-in smart grammar check, automatically identifies inappropriate expressions, provides professional modification suggestions, making your resume more outstanding.
ai.item1_description: AI automatically optimizes content expression, making your resume more professional
ai.item2_description: Automatically detects and corrects grammar and spelling errors

storage.title: Data Security, Privacy First
storage.description: All resume data is fully stored locally, no need to worry about privacy leaks. Support data export backup, ensure your resume data is always available.
storage.item1_description: Resume data securely stored on your computer's hard drive
storage.item2_description: Support PDF and JSON format export

preview.title: What You See Is What You Get

news.label: News
news.content: New AI Resume Enhancement Feature is Live

cta.title: Start Your New Career Chapter
cta.description: Start using Ant Card now to create an impressive resume

items.question: Is Ant Card free to use?
items.answer: Ant Card is currently free, meeting basic resume creation needs. The open-source version's features will remain unchanged, and the PDF export feature will always be free.

items.question: Is my resume data secure?
items.answer: Yes, very secure. Ant Card uses local storage, meaning all your data is stored on your own device with no cloud storage, ensuring complete privacy protection.

items.question: What export formats are supported?
items.answer: We currently support PDF export, ensuring your resume maintains consistent formatting on any device. We plan to support more export formats in the future.

items.question: How can I sync across devices?
items.answer: We provide JSON configuration export, allowing you to save your resume settings in JSON format, accessible anytime, anywhere, on any device.

items.question: How customizable is it?
items.answer: We offer rich customization options, including colors, layouts, and more, allowing you to adjust your resume style according to personal preferences and industry requirements.

hero.description: Easily create professional and beautiful personal cards with real-time editing, multiple templates, and smart layouts. Make your personal presentation outstanding.

about.title: About
about.description: Ant Card is a professional personal card creation tool dedicated to providing users with an easy-to-use and powerful card design experience. We believe everyone should have a beautiful personal showcase card, whether for business occasions or personal branding. Through intelligent design systems and rich template libraries, card creation becomes simple and fun.

smartDesign.title: Smart Card Design
smartDesign.description: AI-driven intelligent layout system that automatically optimizes card design, making your personal presentation more professional and beautiful.

realTimeEdit.title: Real-time Edit Preview
realTimeEdit.description: WYSIWYG editing experience with real-time card effect preview, making your creative process more intuitive and efficient.

diverseTemplates.title: Diverse Templates
diverseTemplates.description: Rich card template library covering business, creative, minimalist and other styles to meet different scenario needs.

taskAutomation.title: Smart Automation

reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.comment: This card creation tool is awesome! Clean interface, powerful features, helped me quickly create professional business cards.

reviews.name: Jane Smith
reviews.comment: The templates are very beautiful, editing experience is great, and export quality is excellent. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Mike Johnson
reviews.comment: As a designer, I'm very satisfied with the layout and color scheme of this tool. Clients love the cards I made.

reviews.name: Sarah Wilson
reviews.comment: Simple operation, comprehensive features. Especially the AI smart optimization feature saved me a lot of time.

questions.question: Is this template free?
questions.answer: Yes, this is a completely free open-source template that you can use and modify freely.

questions.question: What export formats are supported?
questions.answer: Currently supports PNG, JPEG, SVG, PDF and other mainstream formats, with more format support coming in the future.

questions.question: How is data security guaranteed?
questions.answer: All data is stored on your local device, we do not collect or store any of your personal information.

questions.question: Can I customize templates?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide flexible customization features where you can adjust colors, fonts, layouts and other aspects.

questions.question: Is there technical support?
questions.answer: We provide community support, you can submit issues through GitHub Issues and we will respond as soon as possible.
